title: Giant sinkhole opens up in popular Heidelberg oval; Record heatwave to strike | 7NEWS Melbourne
description: Local residents and sports teams have been inconvenienced by a huge sinkhole at AJ Burkitt Reserve, forcing teams to find a new home and causing residents to consider the same. Authorities are ready to sound potential alarms of fast-moving fires as Melbourne faces its hottest week since 2019. title: Meal planning beats weight loss drugs, study finds | 7NEWS
description: A CSIRO study of 78,000 Australians reveals that meal planning leads to an average weight loss of 6 kilograms in 12 weeks, 24% more than those without meal plans. The science agency has launched a new AI tool to create personalised meal plans for users. Pharmaceutical company Novo Nordisk has released a pill version of weight loss injection Wegovy in the United States, offering a needle-free alternative that could eventually reach Australia pending regulatory approval. title: Aussie hoisted to safety from flooded road
description: After attempting to cross a flooded Walsh River, a man was hoisted to safety from his partially submerged car in Far North Queensland. A rescuer was lowered onto the top of the submerged car before they opened the vehicle's roof hatch to collect the man trapped inside. #flood #Dimbulah #WalshRiver #Queensland
